title: Bug 6656: Close button moves down when view resized smaller
description: When the view is resized smaller, the close button is no longer on the same line as the label and moves down. This causes a usability issue as users expect the close button to be located to the far right corner.
OB: When the view is resized smaller, the close button moves down and is no longer on the same line as the label.
EB: The close button should stay on the same line as the label, regardless of the size of the view.
SR:
1. Open the application.
2. Resize the view to a smaller size.
3. Observe the position of the close button in relation to the label.
Expected result: The close button should stay on the same line as the label even when the view is resized smaller.
